query-builder-description: Welcome to the test system of the Simple Query Builder. Please note that this is a work in progress, not all features are included, and it can sometimes be broken. [$1 Feedback is welcome here.]
query-builder-result-error-empty-form: Looks like the Query Builder was empty, please enter a valid query first, then try running it again.
query-builder-result-error-incomplete-fo: One or more fields are empty. Please complete the query or select a fitting field type.
